effect_entries.effect: Inflicts regular damage.  Silences the target for two turns, preventing it from using any sound-based moves.
effect_entries.short_effect: Prevents the target from using sound-based moves for two turns.

flavor_text_entries.lets-go-pikachu-lets-go-eevee:
The user attacks the target’s throat, and the
resultant suffering prevents the target from using
moves that emit sound for two turns.
